headline: Alphabet earnings, Eli Lilly Q4 results, ADP data: What to Watch
summary: Asking for a Trend Host Josh Lipton previews several of the biggest stories to come tomorrow, Wednesday, February 4, including earnings results from Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL), Qualcomm (QCOM), Eli Lilly (LLY), and Novo Nordisk (NVO), and private employment data out from ADP. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.

content.title: Alphabet earnings, Eli Lilly Q4 results, ADP data: What to Watch

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.

headline: Hair Loss Biopharma Firm Veradermics Raises $256 Million in IPO
summary: At the IPO price, Veradermics has a market value of about $596 million based on the outstanding shares listed in its filings.  Wellington Management had indicated interest in purchasing as much as $30 million in shares at the IPO price, according to the filings.

content.summary: At the IPO price, Veradermics has a market value of about $596 million based on the outstanding shares listed in its filings.  Wellington Management had indicated interest in purchasing as much as $30 million in shares at the IPO price, according to the filings.

headline: Eli Lilly sees 2026 profit above estimates as demand for weight‑loss drugs soars
summary: Feb 4 () - Eli Lilly forecast 2026 profit above Wall Street estimates on ​Wednesday, betting on surging demand for ‌its obesity drugs as the world's most valuable ‌drugmaker prepares to launch its oral weight-loss pill later this year. Shares of the company rose nearly 7% in premarket trading.

content.title: Eli Lilly sees 2026 profit above estimates as demand for weight‑loss drugs soars
content.summary: Feb 4 () - Eli Lilly forecast 2026 profit above Wall Street estimates on ​Wednesday, betting on surging demand for ‌its obesity drugs as the world's most valuable ‌drugmaker prepares to launch its oral weight-loss pill later this year. Shares of the company rose nearly 7% in premarket trading.

headline: Lilly: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: INDIANAPOLIS (AP) — Eli Lilly and Co. (LLY) on Wednesday reported fourth-quarter net income of $6.64 billion. The Indianapolis-based company said it had net income of $7.39 per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to $7.54 per share.

content.title: Lilly: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
content.summary: INDIANAPOLIS (AP) — Eli Lilly and Co. (LLY) on Wednesday reported fourth-quarter net income of $6.64 billion. The Indianapolis-based company said it had net income of $7.39 per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to $7.54 per share.

headline: Eli Lilly (NYSE:LLY) Reports Strong Q4 CY2025, Stock Soars
summary: Global pharmaceutical company Eli Lilly (NYSE:LLY) reported Q4 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 42.6% year on year to $19.29 billion. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $81.5 billion at the midpoint came in 5.1% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $7.54 per share was 8.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: Eli Lilly (NYSE:LLY) Reports Strong Q4 CY2025, Stock Soars
content.summary: Global pharmaceutical company Eli Lilly (NYSE:LLY) reported Q4 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 42.6% year on year to $19.29 billion. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $81.5 billion at the midpoint came in 5.1% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $7.54 per share was 8.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Eli Lilly Surges On 'Assertive' Guidance That Assuages Novo Nordisk-Tied Worries
summary: Obesity kingpin Eli Lilly obliterated fourth-quarter forecasts Wednesday and delivered upbeat 2026 guidance, marking a definitive departure from chief rival Novo Nordisk.  Eli Lilly stock surged more than 8% to 1,085.65.  The premarket move sets Lilly up to gap above its 50-day moving average and break a downtrend in an emerging base.

headline: Eli Lilly (LLY) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
